name: CITY OF PHILADELPHIA, Petitioner v. WORKERS' COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (KERSHES), Respondent
name_abbreviation: City of Philadelphia v. Workers' Compensation Appeal Board

parties: CITY OF PHILADELPHIA, Petitioner v. WORKERS’ COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (KERSHES), Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 31st day of December, 2003, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby GRANTED and the order of the Commonwealth Court is REVERSED. See City of Philadelphia v. WCAB (Szparagowski), 831 A.2d 577, 2003 WL 21959994 (Pa. Aug.18, 2003).
Justice THOMAS G. SAYLOR dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
842 A.2d 916
CITY OF PHILADELPHIA, Petitioner v. WORKERS’ COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (KERSHES), Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 31, 2003.
